name: Yvy
summary: YVY is a fast-paced rogue-lite dice battler set in a world inspired by 16th-century Brazil. Channel the power of ancient divinities, craft your perfect dice by strategically choosing each face, and defend your homeland against the threat of colonial invasion. Roll for resistance!

name: Y. Village: The Visitors
summary: Batu, tormented by nightmares, is lured to a nameless village via cryptic letters. Investigating the village's secrets with just one friend, he wakes one night to discover his ally gone. He must now locate his friend and elude the village's dark mysteries.
